name: YesidOCRCamera
summary: YesidOCRCamera is a SwiftUI library for capturing and processing identity cards and passports using OCR and images.
description: YesidOCRCamera is a library designed to simplify the process of capturing and processing identity cards and passports using OCR and images in a SwiftUI app. It provides a straightforward interface for capturing images and extracting relevant information, such as text and metadata, from them. The library utilizes the GoogleMLKit/ObjectDetectionCustom dependency for object detection and classification, ensuring reliable and accurate processing. The library also includes a resource bundle with pre-built assets, making it easy to integrate into your app.
